= Details =

== Jens ==

Jens is a Senior Lecturer at Massey University NZ. He has contributed to the open source community for many years. Projects include: 

  # [http://www.mandarax.org Mandarax] - an inference engine for Java
  # [http://www-ist.massey.ac.nz/wop/ WebOfPatterns] - a design pattern tool for Eclipse


For details, check out Jens' [http://www-ist.massey.ac.nz/JBDietrich/ homepage].

== Bastian ==

Bastian is a Master student in Information- and Mediatechnologies at the [http://www.tu-cottbus.de Brandenburg Technical University] in Cottbus. He is currently working on his Master Thesis at Massey University NZ about rule compilation and a MDA scenario that includes modeling, compiling and executing of rules.

Projects:
  # [http://www.mandarax.org Mandarax] - in particular involved in the  [http://sourceforge.net/projects/mandarax compiler subproject]
  # [http://sourceforge.net/projects/dplab DPLab] - a teaching tool for Design Patterns based on Eclipse
